name: Track Finder App
description: Have you ever been so frustrated to arrive at a running track only to find it closed? Application utilizing npm packages, express-handlebars, sequelize, MySQL. User input allows functionality to add a track, edit a track, or delete a track.

name: Senior Travel COVID Care
description: Application that utilizes a medicare and physician registry API. Target audience is senior citizens. Two APIs were used in the creation as well as a link to Google maps upon selection of a physician.

name: Eat-Da-Burgers App
description: JavaScript + JQuery application that utilizes the open weather API. Application stores user info upon button click to deliver the current and 5-day forecast for the inputted city. Previous searched city is saved as a button so the user can search the same city with ease.

name: Coding Quiz
description: JavaScript created application that utilizes local storage and timer functionalities. User is scored based on time elapsed and correct versus incorrect questions. Scores are saved and generated on a high scores html.

name: Password Generator
description: JavaScript generated application that utilizes user input to deliver a random password.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Third party API utilization that reads the user choice and populates information on the dashboard.  User can search past history, get the current asn 5-day forecast, and get a UV index.

name: Employee Directory
description: Basic user directory built using React and a third party API.  App is able to sort and filter information.

name: Fitness Tracker
description: App that allows user to track their exercise utilizing MongoDB, NoSQL, Heroku for deployment.  The app accumulates inputted exercise and tracks the exercises day by day by type (either muscular fitness or cardiovascular).
